mapper.select: select seq, title, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as regdate from BoardAdoption order by seq desc
mapper.insert: insert into BoardAdoption ( seq, idMember, idAdmin, seqPet, title, content, image, regdate) values ( seqBoardAdoption.nextVal, 'user', #{idAdmin}, #{seqPet}, #{title}, #{content}, #{image}, default )
